title: The Last Emperor
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The dramatic history of Pu Yi, the last of the Emperors of China, from his lofty birth and brief reign in the Forbidden City, the object of worship by half a billion people, through his abdication, his decline and dissolute lifestyle.

title: Moonstruck
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

title: The Untouchables
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

title: Wall Street
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

title: Broadcast News
description: Take two rival television news producers (one male, one female), add one handsome but vapid anchorman, and you have the perfect recipe for romantic and professional conflict.

title: Fatal Attraction
description: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

title: Full Metal Jacket
description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

title: The Princess Bride
description: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: RoboCop
description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

title: Good Morning, Vietnam
description: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam.

title: Empire of the Sun
description: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

title: Lethal Weapon
description: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

title: Predator
description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

title: Dirty Dancing
description: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

title: The Witches of Eastwick
description: Three dissatisfied women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flashy stranger arrives in their lives.

title: Hope and Glory
description: A semi-autobiographical story about a nine-year-old boy growing up in London during the Blitz of World War II.

title: Cry Freedom
description: South African journalist Donald Woods is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death in custody of his friend, the black activist Steve Biko.

title: Ironweed
description: An alcoholic drifter returns home to Albany, New York after a 22 year absence, spending Halloween in the company of an alcoholic ex-singer and radio star.

title: Radio Days
description: A look at a boy's life in the golden age of radio.

title: The Dead
description: At a dinner party in 1904 Dublin, a professor and his wife grapple with the discovery that she once loved a boy who died for her sake.

title: Innerspace
description: A test pilot is miniaturized in a secret experiment and accidentally injected into the body of a hapless store clerk.

title: Harry and the Hendersons
description: The Henderson family adopt a friendly Sasquatch but have a hard time trying to keep him a secret.

title: Au Revoir les Enfants
description: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. He becomes the roommate of top student in his class. Rivals at first, the roommates form a bond and share a secret.

title: Babette's Feast
description: In 19th century Denmark, two adult sisters live in an isolated village with their father, who is the honored pastor of a small Protestant church that is almost a sect. After some years, a French refugee from the 1871 Commune of Paris, Babette, arrives at their door.

title: Pelle the Conqueror
description: A Swedish father and his young son, Pelle, emigrate to Denmark in the late 19th century in hopes of a better life.

title: Mannequin
description: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

title: Beverly Hills Cop II
description: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

title: Throw Momma from the Train
description: A bitter ex-husband and a put-upon mama's boy attempt to swap murders to get rid of their respective women.

title: Matewan
description: A labor union organizer comes to an embattled mining community in West Virginia during the violent struggles of the 1920s.

title: Gaby: A True Story
description: The story of Gabriela Brimmer, a Mexican writer and poet born with cerebral palsy.

title: Street Smart
description: A magazine reporter fabricates a story about a pimp to save his job, but is drawn into the world of a real pimp who believes the story is about him.

title: Anna
description: An aging Czech actress struggles to find work in New York City, and takes in a young Czech immigrant who begins to take over her life.

title: Dark Eyes
description: On board a ship, a married Italian man tells a Russian stranger the story of his encounter with a beautiful Russian woman at a health spa.

title: Maurice
description: Two male college students at Cambridge fall in love, but must hide their relationship given the oppressive culture of Edwardian England.

title: The Whales of August
description: Two aged sisters reflect on their lives and their relationship while spending a summer in a seaside house in Maine.

title: Pathfinder
description: A young boy witnesses the murder of his family by the Chudes, a menacing tribe. He is taken prisoner and forced to lead them to other villagers, but he plots his revenge.

title: The Family
description: The story of an Italian family that spans from 1906 to 1986, narrated by Carlo, the patriarch.

title: Withnail and I
description: Two unemployed actors, Withnail and I, drift through their days in a haze of alcohol and drugs in 1969 London.

title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
description: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with an obnoxious slob of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.

title: Evil Dead II
description: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

title: Wings of Desire
description: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

title: Where Is the Friend's House?
description: An 8 year old boy must return his friend's notebook that he took by mistake, lest his friend be punished by expulsion from school.

title: Raising Arizona
description: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

title: Swimming to Cambodia
description: Spalding Gray sits behind a desk and talks about his life, his experiences in the theater, and his role in the film "The Killing Fields."

title: Sign o' the Times
description: Prince and his band perform 13 numbers, most of them from his double album, 'Sign o' the Times.'

title: The Man Who Planted Trees
description: The story of a solitary shepherd who patiently plants oak trees in a desolate valley, transforming it over decades into a lush paradise.

title: My Life as a Dog
description: A young boy is sent to live with relatives in a country village when his mother falls ill.

title: The Emperor's Naked Army Marches On
description: A documentary following Kenzô Okuzaki, a veteran of the Second World War, as he attempts to track down the officers responsible for the unexplained deaths of two soldiers in his unit.

title: Bagdad Cafe
description: A German tourist, abandoned by her husband in the middle of the desert, finds community at a rundown truck stop.

title: Four Adventures of Reinette and Mirabelle
description: Two young women, one a city girl and one a country girl, become roommates in Paris and share various life experiences.

title: A Chinese Ghost Story
description: A tax collector spends a night in a haunted temple where he falls in love with a female ghost.
